QuestData.Title: Devastation Below
QuestData.Description: Let's get down there and finish that big bug off, you and I.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Voress'thalik with the aid of Hawkmaster Nurong.
QuestData.RewardText: Where have you been all my life?! That was amazing!$B$BI'd be proud to fight beside you any day.
